original_text: The man who had died came out, his hands and feet bound with linen strips, and his face wrapped with a cloth. Jesus said to them, “Unbind him, and let him go.”
korean_text: 죽은 자가 수족을 베로 동인 채로 나오는데 그 얼굴은 수건에 싸였더라 예수께서 이르시되 풀어 놓아 다니게 하라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: The man who had died came out
his hands and feet bound with linen strips
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 손과 발은 세마포로 묶여 있었고

sentences.original_text: and his face wrapped with a cloth
